name: the-icatalyst-crm
description: Partnership-focused CRM for Smart Home Integrators

scripts.install:all: npm run install:database && npm run install:api
scripts.generate:api: cd apps/api && npx prisma generate --schema=../../packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma --generator api_client
scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run generate && npm run build:api
scripts.start: npm run generate:api && cd apps/api && npx tsx src/index.ts
scripts.db:push: cd packages/database && npx prisma db push
